mapper.select: SELECT tose_id as toseId,tose_code as toseCode,tose_name as toseName, tose_level as toseLevel,tose_version as toseVersion, (case when tour.tour_name is null then '系统' else tour.tour_name end) as toseUnionCustName, m.isenable,m.tose_status as toseStatus,code.code_name as toseStatusName, (case when t.ASSIGNEE_ = #{currentUser} then 1 else 0 end) as rightFlag FROM tvso_scheme m INNER JOIN tvso_parameter_code code ON code.code_code = m.tose_status AND code.code_type = 'status' LEFT JOIN tvso_user tour ON tour.tour_id = tose_union_cust LEFT JOIN (select a.ASSIGNEE_,c.BUSINESS_KEY_,b.KEY_ from act_ru_task a inner join act_re_procdef b on b.ID_ = a.PROC_DEF_ID_ inner join act_ru_execution c on c.ID_ = a.PROC_INST_ID_ where b.KEY_ = 'SchemeProcess') t ON m.tose_id = t.BUSINESS_KEY_ AND t.KEY_ = 'SchemeProcess' WHERE 1=1 AND tose_code LIKE CONCAT(#{toseCode},'%') AND tose_name LIKE CONCAT(#{toseName},'%') AND tose_equipment_country = #{toseEquipmentCountry} ORDER BY FIELD(m.tose_status,4,3,1,2) DESC,tose_code DESC
SELECT tosd_id ,tosd_tose_id ,tosd_model_id ,tosd_model_order,tosd_ref_type ,tosd_ref_id FROM tvso_scheme_d tosd WHERE tosd_tose_id = #{toseId}

SELECT tosdRefUrlList FROM ( SELECT '1' as refType,tomd_id as refId,tomd_poster_url as tosdRefUrlList FROM tvso_material_data a WHERE a.isenable = 1 UNION ALL SELECT '2' as refType,toan_id as refId,toan_icon as tosdRefUrlList FROM tvso_application b WHERE b.isenable = 1 AND b.toan_status = 3) t
(refId = ${id} AND refType = substring_index(substring_index('${type}',',', ${i} + 1), ',', -1))
GROUP BY FIELD(t.`refId`,
${id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tvso_scheme SET tose_equipment_core = #{toseEquipmentCore}, tose_equipment_type = #{toseEquipmentType}, tose_equipment_country = #{toseEquipmentCountry}, tose_language = #{toseLanguage}, tose_level = #{toseLevel}, tose_version = #{toseVersion}, tose_union_cust = #{toseUnionCust}, tose_remark = #{toseRemark}, modtime = now(), moduser = #{modUser} WHERE tose_id = #{toseId}
UPDATE tvso_scheme SET isenbale = 0, modtime = now() WHERE tose_id = #{toseId}
UPDATE tvso_scheme SET isenbale = 1, modtime = now() WHERE tose_id = #{toseId}
mapper.select:
SELECT tose_code as toseCode,tose_name as toseName FROM tvso_scheme WHERE 1=1
AND tose_name LIKE CONCAT(#{_parameter},'%') limit 10

SELECT distinct tose_union_cust as toseUnionCust , (case when tose_union_cust = 'system' then '系统' else tour.tour_name end) as toseUnionCustName FROM tvso_scheme m LEFT JOIN tvso_user tour ON tour.tour_id = tose_union_cust WHERE tose_union_cust != '' AND tose_union_cust = 'system'
AND (case when tose_union_cust = 'system' then '系统' else tour.tour_name end) LIKE CONCAT(#{_parameter},'%') limit 10

SELECT materialId,materialType,materialTypeName,materialName,materialIcon,materialRemark FROM( SELECT tomd_id as materialId,1 as materialType,'普通素材' as materialTypeName,tomd_name as materialName, tomd_poster_url as materialIcon,tomd_remark as materialRemark FROM tvso_material_data a WHERE a.isenable = 1 UNION ALL SELECT toan_id as materialId,2 as materialType,'应用' as materialTypeName,toan_name as materialName, toan_icon as materialIcon,toan_remark as materialRemark FROM tvso_application b WHERE b.isenable = 1 AND b.toan_status = 3) t WHERE 1=1 AND materialType = #{materialType} AND materialName LIKE CONCAT(#{materialName},'%')
